    "number": 8934,
    "data": "1,1,2,7,41,397,6377,171886,7892642,627340987,87635138366,21808110976027,9780286524758582,7981750158298108606,11950197013167283686587,33046443615914736611839942",
    "name": "Number of tournament sequences: sequences (a_1, a_2, ..., a_n) with a_1 = 1 such that a_i < a_{i+1} <= 2*a_i for all i.",
    "comment": [
        "Also number of Meeussen sequences of length n (see the Cook-Kleber reference).",
        "Column 1 of triangle A093729. Also generated by the iteration procedure that constructs triangle A093654. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 14 2004"
    ],
    "link": [
        "T. D. Noe, <a href=\"/A008934/b008934.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n=0..30</a>",
        "M. Cook and M. Kleber, <a href=\"http://www.combinatorics.org/ojs/index.php/eljc/article/view/v7i1r44\">Tournament sequences and Meeussen sequences</a>, Electronic J. Comb. 7 (2000), #R44.",
        "E. Neuwirth, <a href=\"http://www.mat.univie.ac.at/~slc/wpapers/s47neuwirth.html\">Computing tournament sequence numbers efficiently...</a>, S\u00e9minaire Lotharingien de Combinatoire, B47h (2002), 12 pp.",
        "Mauro Torelli, <a href=\"http://www.numdam.org/item?id=ITA_2006__40_2_107_0\">Increasing integer sequences and Goldbach's conjecture</a>, RAIRO - Theoretical Informatics and Applications - Informatique Th\u00e9orique et Applications, 40:2 (2006), pp. 107-121.",
        "<a href=\"/index/To#tournament\">Index entries for sequences related to tournaments</a>"
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = A093729(n, 1). a(n) = A093655(2^n). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 14 2004",
        "a(n) = A097710(n, 0). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 24 2004",
        "From _Benedict W. J. Irwin_, Nov 26 2016: (Start)",
        "Conjecture: a(n) is given by a series of nested sums as follows:",
        "a(2) = Sum_{i=1..2} 1,",
        "a(3) = Sum_{i=1..2}Sum_{j=1..i+2} 1,",
        "a(4) = Sum_{i=1..2}Sum_{j=1..i+2}Sum_{k=1..i+j+2} 1,",
        "a(5) = Sum_{i=1..2}Sum_{j=1..i+2}Sum_{k=1..i+j+2}Sum_{l=1..i+j+k+2} 1.",
        "(End)"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "t[n_?Negative, _] = 0; t[0, _] = 1; t[_, 0] = 0; t[n_, k_] /; k <= n :=  t[n, k] = t[n, k-1] - t[n-1, k] + t[n-1, 2k-1] + t[n-1, 2 k]; t[n_, k_] /; k > n :=  t[n, k] =Sum[(-1)^(j-1) Binomial[n+1, j]*t[n, k-j] , {j, 1, n+1}]; Table[t[n, 1], {n, 0, 15} ] (* _Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Alcover_, May 17 2011, after PARI prog. *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) {T(n,k)=if(n<0,0,if(n==0,1,if(k==0,0, if(k<=n,T(n,k-1)-T(n-1,k)+T(n-1,2*k-1)+T(n-1,2*k), sum(j=1,n+1,(-1)^(j-1)*binomial(n+1,j)*T(n,k-j))))))} /*(Cook-Kleber)*/ a(n)=T(n,1)"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A058222, A058223.",
        "Cf. A093729, A093655.",
        "Forms column 0 of triangle A097710."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,nice,easy",
    "offset": "0,3",
    "author": "Mauro Torelli (torelli(AT)hermes.mc.dsi.unimi.it), _Jeffrey Shallit_",
    "references": 25,
    "revision": 43,
    "time": "2016-11-30T05:43:42-05:00",
    "created": "1996-03-15T03:00:00-05:00"
}
